sentences.sContent: She claims she's being ostracized by some members of her local community.
sentences.sCn: 她声称遭到自己所在社区的一些成员排斥。

synos.tran: 放逐；排斥；按贝壳流放法放逐

remMethod.val: ostrac(贝壳) + ize → 用投贝壳的方法决定是否放逐某人 → 放逐

words.tran: （古希腊）贝壳放逐法；排斥（等于ostracize）

trans.tranCn: (古希腊)贝壳放逐法, 放逐, 排斥
trans.tranOther: If someone is ostracized, people deliberately behave in an unfriendly way toward them and do not allow them to take part in any of their social activities
